original: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naāsavasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā
analyzed: na āsava sampayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ ca na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca dhammā

original: Naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: na āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Naāsavavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā
analyzed: na āsava vippayuttam dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ ca na āsava vippayuttaḥ ca dhammā

original: Naāsavasampayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto dhammo
analyzed: na āsava sampayuttañca na āsava vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayuttaḥ dhammaḥ

original: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavasampayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: uppajjati hetu paccayā na āsava sampayuttañca na āsava vippayuttañca dhammam paṭicca

original: naāsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Naāsavasampayuttañca naāsavavippayuttañca
analyzed: na āsava vippayuttaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā na āsava sampayuttañca na āsava vippayuttañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavasampayutto ca naāsavavippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na āsava sampayutto ca na āsava vippayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe cha …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
analyzed: hetuyā nava ārammaṇe cha pe vipāke ekam pe avigate nava sabbattha vitthāro
